Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Allows a continuous service credit for peace officers of the unified court system who were laid off for economy reasons
Summary: Allows a continuous service credit for retirement purposes for peace officers of the unified court system who were laid off for economy reasons in 1991 and returned to service in 1992.
ActClause: AN ACT to allow a continuous service credit for peace officers of the unified court system who were laid off because of economy measures
